creator: peterthehe
title: Interactive Holograms
materials_required: Acetate paper (or transparent substitute like plexiglass or CD cases)
description: This project creates an interactive holographic interface using a pyramid projector, webcam tracking, and custom software to play games, watch videos, and create custom "holograms".
steps: Measure the size of your screen.
Construct an equilateral triangle on A4 paper with sides half the length of the screen size, then create an isosceles trapezoid within it.
Cut out the trapezoid and use it as a guide to cut four acetate sheets.
Tape the acetate trapezoids together to form a pyramid.
Remove the stand from your monitor and balance it facing upwards using books or blocks.
Place the projection pyramid on the monitor.
Mount the webcam to the side of the screen with a clear view of the interaction area.
Download and extract the tracking software package.
Open ExBawx.exe from the Tracking folder.
Adjust camera settings (contrast, brightness, saturation) in the Camera tab to make your coloured object stand out.
Go to the Tracking tab, hold the coloured object in front of the camera, and click Add Marker. Select the marker by clicking and dragging.
Go to the Game tab, click Select Data File, find the game's data file (NameOfGame_Data), select MouseData.md, and click Start.
Open the game on your monitor and move the coloured object to interact with the holograms (up/down/left/right for rotation, forward/backward for zoom).
